field.name: Sticky top
field.description: Make the top keep it's position while scrolling

field.name: Brand color one
field.description: Used by content ItemTypes

field.name: Brand color two
field.description: Used by content ItemTypes

field.name: Background color
field.description: Only for use with the layout normal mode (First selection)

field.name: Height
field.description: In px. This will effect the total height of the navigation bar.

field.name: Heading color
field.description: Only for the Megamenu

field.name: Heading size
field.description: Only for the Megamenu. The size is in em. The em unit is relative to the font-size of the document (2em means 2 times the size of the base font)

field.name: Promotion image
field.description: Only for the Megamenu

field.name: Promotion link
field.description: Only for the Megamenu

field.name: Levels
field.description: How many levels of navigation do you need? min 1 max 3

field.name: Open facet groups
field.description: Choose how many facet groups that should be open from the start. (From top and down)

field.name: List view
field.description: If you change this, start by clearing your browser cache. The view cookie has a lifteime of 24h.

field.name: Grid view
field.description: If you change this, start by clearing your browser cache. The view cookie has a lifteime of 24h.

field.name: Details view
field.description: If you change this, start by clearing your browser cache. The view cookie has a lifteime of 24h.

field.name: Default list view
field.description: Chose a view that is already enabled

field.name: Only preview for anonymous users
field.description: Hide price, stock info and add to cart button for anonymous users

field.name: Enable "New!" stickers
field.description: Enable showing "New" stickers for newest products

field.name: "New!" stickers expiration
field.description: In days

field.name: Hide free services
field.description: Hides Payment and shipping from the cart summery, if they are free

field.name: Address
field.description: Company address for Google

field.name: Business name
field.description: Business name for Google

field.name: Contact e-mail
field.description: Needed for the emails that the system sends out and for Google

field.name: Contact number
field.description: Needed for the emails that the system sends out and for Google

field.name: Business photo
field.description: Picture for Google

field.name: Wireframe mode
field.description: Choose this if you want to ignore all the above design configurations. This may be handy to use before starting the design process and when planning the project.

field.name: Google maps API key
field.description: Get it from here: https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key

field.name: Use custom javascript
field.description: Include the js/Custom.js file in the master template
